title: Moss Mother
text: Guardian of the Moss Grotto, her vines block Hornet’s ascent.

title: Feral Sentinel
text: A relentless hunter that stalks the lower paths of Pharloom.

title: Bell Beast
text: Its tolling roar shakes the ascent, guarding the way forward.

title: Marrow Judge
text: An arbiter of Pharloom’s castes, blocking Hornet’s climb.

title: Lace (First Encounter)
text: Hornet’s rival appears, testing her resolve in battle.
